WEEKEND_NO_ORDER_DESCRIPTION_BOX: No orders can be placed on weekends. Please select another day.
WARNING_PERMANENT_ORDER:
The permanent order will remain active until you change or delete it.
This also applies in case of illness or other absence of the participant.

Cateringexpert assumes no liability for orders that are not collected due to illness or other absence.

WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to the ordering application for the facility
FORM_INSTRUCTIONS: Please fill out the form first to proceed.
SELECTED_LANGUAGE_INSTRUCTIONS: The selected language will be saved as a preference.
REGISTRATION_TENANT_CHANGES: All entries can be changed later.
REGISTRATION_SUCCESS: Your account has been successfully created and a confirmation has been sent.
REGISTRATION_STUNDENT_EMAIL_SENT: An email with your account information has been sent to your email address.
EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address.
REGISTRATION_TENANT_SUCCESS: Your personal information has been successfully entered
REGISTRATION_STUDENT_DELETE_SPECIAL_FOOD:
Deleting the special food for allergies will remove an existing permanent order for the participant. Do you want to proceed?

The permanent order can be created again afterwards.
REGISTRATION_INSTRUCTIONS: Please enter all the data and then click "create".
REGISTRATION_CONFIRMATION: Afterwards, you will receive a confirmation by email to your registered email address.
SPECIAL_FOOD_INSTRUCTIONS: Available special foods for allergies are provided by the respective caterer. If you have any questions about this, please contact the respective caterer. If a special food for allergies is activated, it will be included in the order of the respective participant.
UNKNOWN_SUBGROUP_INSTRUCTIONS: If you are unsure which subgroup the participant belongs to, please click "unknown"
REGISTRATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thank you for registering. We have sent you a confirmation email of your registration to your registered email address.
REGISTRATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_SPLIT: The assignment of students to the respective subgroup is carried out by the facility. Only after the assignment by the facility can an order be placed.
REGISTRATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_SPLIT_NOT_S: No subgroup assignment has been made. Only after the assignment by the facility can an order be placed.
EMAIL_SUPPORT_MESSAGE:
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
Visit us on our website at https://cateringexpert.de/hilfecenter
or send us an email at support@cateringexpert.de.
SUBGROUP_REGISTER_STUDENT_INSTRUCTIONS_T: The participant must be assigned to a subgroup. If you do not know the subgroup, please select [Unknown]. The facility will assign the subgroup.
SUBGROUP_REGISTER_STUDENT_INSTRUCTIONS: The participant must be assigned to a subgroup before food can be ordered.
SUBGROUP_REGISTER_STUDENT_INSTRUCTIONS_S: The facility assigns the subgroup to the respective student. Please contact the facility.
MANAGE_STUDENTS.TITLE: Participants
MANAGE_STUDENTS.NAME: Name
MANAGE_STUDENTS.EDIT_DESCRIPTION: To change the first or last name of the participant, enter the desired change and then click "Change".
MANAGE_STUDENTS.ALLERGY_FOOD_DESCRIPTION:
If the participant has allergies, please select the appropriate food. The food for allergies is set by the respective caterer. If you have any questions about this, please contact the respective caterer. If a food for allergies is activated, this will be automatically transmitted to the caterer for all your orders.

Note: If the food for allergies is changed later, this change will not be considered for already placed orders.
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS.NAME: Name
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS.EXISTING_ORDER: There is already a permanent order for the participant. To make changes to the permanent order, confirm the change with the button "Change permanent order".
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS.NEW_ORDER: To create or change a permanent order, select the desired days and the menu for each day and confirm the selection with the button "Add permanent order".
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS_ERROR_NO_DAY: Please select at least one day

MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.ERROR_INVALID_IBAN: The IBAN must start with a country code and have a valid length. Please check your input.
MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.ORDER_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION: Receive a confirmation email for orders and cancellations
MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.BALANCE_REMINDER_DESCRIPTION: Receive a reminder when your balance falls below 15.00â‚¬
MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.DISPLAY_ORDER_DESCRIPTION: If enabled, the entire week will be displayed in the app view

DESCRIPTION: To place an order, first select the desired date.
If you have multiple children, you can select the child for whom you want to place the order.
To order the dish, click on the box of the desired dish.
To cancel a dish, click on the box of the desired dish again or on the trash icon.
To change a dish, you must first cancel the dish and then order the desired dish.
To view the entire week, click on the box [Show entire week].
You also have the option to place a permanent order. To do this, go to [Permanent order].
Here you will find help for the individual functions of the application.
In the overview, you can see your current balance and your recent orders.
You can cancel orders by clicking on [Cancel].
If the field is grayed out, the deadline for cancellation has expired.
If there are messages from the caterer, the facility, or Cateringexpert, they will be displayed here.
To mark the message as read, click [Close].
Old messages can be viewed under the tab [Messages].
Messages are automatically deleted after 30 days.
Permanent orders are automatically entered as soon as the order deadline for the respective day has expired.
IMPORTANT: The permanent order will continue until you change or delete it.
This also applies in case of illness or other absence of the participant.
If you do not have enough balance on the account, the order will not be executed.
If you have enabled email sending for orders under [Settings], you will receive a confirmation or error message for each order by email.
No permanent order will be executed on registered closing days or holidays.
The entry of closing times is done by the caterer or the facility.
To place a permanent order, go to [Edit] for the respective participant.
Then you can select the desired days and the menu for each day.
To confirm the permanent order, go to [Add permanent order].
To create a participant (child) for the order, enter the child's first and last name.
If the child has allergies, please select the appropriate food. The food for allergies is set by the respective caterer.
For multiple subgroups, please select the appropriate subgroup. If you do not know the subgroup, please select [Unknown].
If the subgroup setting is only done by the facility, this will be displayed in the message.
Without the assignment to a subgroup, no order can be placed.
To create another participant, click [Add another participant].
In the account overview, you can view all your deposits and withdrawals.
To create a CSV file, go to [CSV Export] and select the desired period.
To order food, your account must be topped up.
You can top up your account either by transfer or directly.
Deposits by transfer are free and take up to 3 business days.
If you want to top up directly, you will be redirected to our payment provider.
Depending on the payment provider, fees may apply. The estimated fees will be displayed.
To withdraw money from your account, click [Withdraw money].
Here you will find all the messages sent by the facility, the caterer, or Cateringexpert.
Messages are automatically deleted after 30 days.
In the order history, you can view all your orders and cancellations.
To search for a specific entry, enter the desired search term in the search field.
To create a CSV file, go to [CSV Export] and select the desired period.
To create a participant (child) for the order, enter the child's first and last name.
If the child has allergies, please select the appropriate food. The food for allergies is set by the respective caterer.
For multiple subgroups, please select the appropriate subgroup. If you do not know the subgroup, please select [Unknown].
If the subgroup setting is only done by the facility, this will be displayed in the message.
Without the assignment to a subgroup, no order can be placed.
To create another participant, click [Add another participant].
In the settings, you can adjust your master data as well as set your preferences for order confirmations and balance reminders.
The IBAN setting is required to be able to withdraw funds.
The specified email address will be used to send order confirmations and balance reminders (if enabled).
Please confirm all changes with [Change].
The week plan is provided by your caterer and can be downloaded as a PDF.
Select the desired year and calendar week for which you want to view the week plan.
Then click either on [View] or [Download].

ACCOUNT.ERROR_WITHDRAW_FUNDS_NOT_ENOUGH: You currently have no balance in your account.
ACCOUNT.ERROR_WITHDRAW_FUNDS_NOT_IBAN:
To initiate a withdrawal, please enter your bank details and current address.

You can enter and edit these details in the navigation under [Settings].
ACCOUNT.WITHDRAW_DEPOSIT_FUNDS_PROCESSED:
Your withdrawal has been received and is being processed.
It may take up to 5 business days for the money to be transferred to your account.
You can view the current status under [Account movement details].
ACCOUNT.SUCCESS_DEPOSIT_MESSAGE:
Your deposit was successful!
The deposit amount has been credited to your account.
ACCOUNT.ERROR_DEPOSIT_MESSAGE:
Your deposit could not be executed.
Please check your input.

If the error persists, please contact support@cateringexpert.de
ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT.TEXT_BANNER: To top up your account, you must first add a participant. Click here to add a participant.
ACCOUNT.DEPOSIT_INSTRUCTIONS: To top up your account, please transfer the desired amount to the following account:
ACCOUNT.USERNAME_NOTE: Please make sure to include your username
ACCOUNT.PURPOSE_INSTRUCTIONS: in the purpose field. Make sure to enter your username exactly as indicated in the purpose field. Otherwise, your deposit cannot be assigned to your account. A manual review would be required in this case and could take several business days.
ACCOUNT.DIRECT_DEPOSIT_DESCRIPTION: Deposit money directly into your account with PayPal, Giropay, or credit card. The money will be credited to your account immediately.
ACCOUNT.FEES_NOTE: Fees for individual payments are charged by the payment providers. Deposits by transfer are free. Estimated fees:
ACCOUNT.WITHDRAW_CONFIRMATION: Do you want to withdraw the following balance:
ACCOUNT.WITHDRAW_INSTRUCTIONS: The money will be transferred to your registered bank account. Your registered IBAN is:
ACCOUNT.PROFILE_NOTE: You can view and edit the bank details in your profile.
ACCOUNT.BANK_DETAILS_NOTE: Please ensure that the bank details are correct.
ACCOUNT.TRANSFER_DURATION: The transfer may take up to 5 business days

KONTO_AUFLOESEN_DETAILS: Below you can close your account.
IM_FOLGENDEN__KOENNEN_SIE_IHR_KONTO_AUFL: Please note: Your account will no longer be active after closing and you will not be able to place any more orders. All settings, orders, and account data will be deleted. This option cannot be undone.
GELD_AUSZAHLEN_KONTO_SCHLIESSEN: To close your account, you need to request a payout for your balance. Go to [Account Overview] and follow the instructions.
WICHTIG_DAUERBESTELLUNG: The standing order will be automatically triggered after the respective order deadline.
BESTELLUNG_FIRST_INIT_TEXT_EINS:
The order deadline for the respective order days is set by your catering provider. After the order deadline has passed, cancellation or modification of the order is no longer possible.
Important: We (Cateringexpert) have no influence on the order deadlines and cannot change them. Also, we cannot make any changes after the order deadlines have passed.
Thank you for your understanding.
WEITERE_INFORMATIONEN: Further information on ordering can be found at the bottom right of the page.
ODER_UNTEN_AUF_DER_SEITE: or in the sidebar navigation at the bottom
